segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for those cookies, and my heart races a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable; I can’t believe he’s trying to climb higher.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s a part of me that wants to yell for him to stop, to get down before he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s thrilling in a way – the risk he’s taking for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I watch as he extends his hand, fingers brushing the cookie jar lid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing there, her arm raised, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They don’t even seem to realize how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR
